 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָזַק‎</span>] **verb** ==dig about== (Late Hebrew ***id.***, also ***surround, enclose***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עִזְקְתָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***ring***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***cleave*** or ***furrow the earth*** with implement <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***well, cistern***); — 

**Pi\`el** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְעַזְּקֵהוּ‎</span> [[Isa.5.2|Isa 5:2]] (intensive) ***and he dug it carefully about***.
